name: Pro Yakyuu Nettou Puzzle Stadium
overview: Pro yakyuu Nettou Puzzle Stadium is the Playstation version of a game that was first released for the SNES console. The gameplay is the usual in the 2d puzzle games make combinations or join puzzle pieces of the same colour to make them dissapear and sometimes makes an attack to the opponent. The game uses the team of the Pro Yakyuu series and uses the baseball theme.
